still tryecrypt is the recommended software by the community?
i like cryptsetup+LUKS for OS encryption and truecrypt for other stuff
hm I see. what the best way to encrypt my entire system? would it be best to do that at install, I have no problem with reinstalling, will do that in a couple of days when 10.10 goes stable anyways
to encrypt your os, yeah you need a reinstall and i'd use cryptsetup+LUKS for that

also, I have loads of external drives too. those are easy to encrypt with truecrypt, and then when plugging them in, you will need to enter the passphrase? what about internal extra harddrives. how should I encrypt those the best way?
for the externals i use truecrypt, you plug them in and open truecrypt and enter the pass/key
it's really up to you which one you want to use
ok, thanks. could you point me to some guide or similar on how that process is done? im new to encryptions efc.
well you plug the drive in, open truecrypt, select the drive, mount it, it asks for the password and/or keyfile and that's it
yeah, thats hopefully not that troublesome, I was thinking more about encrypting the full system
